pageContext.claim: “The Democrat really, the Democrat Party is the Socialist Party, and maybe worse, voters are making a mass exodus from that party, and we are welcoming them to the Republican Party with wide open arms and the Republican Party is doing great.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence of a "mass exodus" of voters from the Democratic party. Trump has certainly attracted some Democrats, but he has also turned off many suburban Republican voters, especially women, which is why the Democrats took control of the House in the 2018 elections.
